tracer.renders

Class RenderShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • tracer.renders.Render
      • tracer.renders.RenderShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, Drawable

    public class RenderShape
extends Render
    Draws a list of Point objects as a shape using Processing's beginShape() and endShape() method.
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]
